text: xo brrda phu sraththa xey cng khx lukæthosʹ dæ xallxhˌ dwy kar lukæthosʹ xyang cringcang theid bangthi phracea khxng phwk cea ca lblang khwam phid khxng phwk cea xxk cak phwk cea læa ca thrng hı phwk cea khea swn swrrkh hlakhlay n beuxng lang swn swrrkh nan mi lana hlay say hil phan wan thi xallxhˌ ca mi thrng tha hı na bi læa brrda phu sraththa rwm kab khea txng xapys sængswang khxng phwk khea ca sxng ca pi beuxnghna khxng phwk khea læa thang beuxng khwa khxng phwk khea phwk khea ca klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea khx phraxngkh di thrng pord thahı sængswang khxng rea xyu kab rea tlxd pi læa thrng yk thosʹ hı kæ rea thæcring phraxngkh than pen phuthrng xanuphaph henux thuk sing
